database-object.create: CREATE TRIGGER INSERT_VENDOR AFTER INSERT ON VENDOR FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE ACCOUNT A SET A.OPENING_BALANCE = A.OPENING_BALANCE + NEW.BALANCE,A.CURRENT_BALANCE = A.CURRENT_BALANCE + NEW.BALANCE,A.TOTAL_BALANCE = A.TOTAL_BALANCE + NEW.BALANCE WHERE A.ID = NEW.ACCOUNTS_PAYABLE_ID; END
